title: [Watching television]
brief_description: Short comic film made in 1958 by Graham Foster and friends to send to his relatives in New Zealand. Structured as ‘a mini sitcom’ the film features a group of friends engrossed in the act of watching television and has a voiceover by Foster. Features television advertising from the late 1950s. Companion piece to ‘A Kiwi in Exile’.
